* D didn't mean to make Fenox lose her balence, his muscles jerking under 
his fur to try and see if he could catch her but she never fell.
D pressed his ears to his head.*

" Sorry."

* He cocked an ear in her direction then and listened to her.
So, he could either pick to go to the training rooms or the labs. Well, 
there was no contest there. D doubted that he wanted to see a lab again, but 
even while he lived with the Flesh he enjoyed his sessions in the holo 
rooms, where they tested his reflexes and things such as that.
D brushed his shoulder against Fenox's, but not as hard as he had before.*

" Training rooms."
